name: BagPack KnockBack
description:
BagPack Knockback 

You're an block and you gotta gather all the Bagpack from the platfromers present, only then you can procced to go Home. Your mission is collect all bagpacks present.

This My first Jam,so it is still unpolished so for that I am sorry and hopeful for constrictive feedback. 

Dont Fall Haha from ledge

CONTROLS (for those who need instructions):

A to move left

D to move right

Space to jump/climb walls

press space *2 for double jump as well as climb 

---------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy Happy Ramadan 2020

From Nepal 

Sanji12

Assest use are made in unity

music used for loop :https://octopupus.itch.io/8-bit-looped-track
